name: suntanned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having pleasantly brown skin caused by being in hot sun: suntanned arms See
suntan
More examplesFewer examples It's a sweltering day, and the beach is packed with suntanned bodies.Olivia returned to the workplace looking suntanned, relaxed and infinitely happy. After a couple of days in Spain, I still did not feel suntanned enough to compete with the deeply bronzed women who were sitting by the pool so I went for the fake version.The college freshmen throughout the cafeteria were suntanned and vigorous, their faces lively after a morning of horseback riding.
